body_html: Let me just add to @ueser's comments, that many of us are on CUDA 7.5. There are a lot of reasons for this, not the least of which is that if you're setting up a new machine, its a lot easier to get a working 7.5 installation with a current distro than a working 7.0 installation. So part of what's needed is permitting compilation with 7.5.

body: Let me just add to @ueser's comments, that many of us are on CUDA 7.5.  There are a lot of reasons for this, not the least of which is that if you're setting up a new machine, its a lot easier to get a working 7.5 installation with a current distro than a working 7.0 installation.  So part of what's needed is permitting compilation with 7.5.
